message:
Thank you for choosing Ex Stay. Please find attached your {{ doc.name }} for your reference.

Please review the details and let us know if any changes are required. If everything looks good, kindly proceed with the necessary steps to confirm your booking.

For any questions, feel free to reach out to us. We look forward to hosting you!

Best regards,

Ex Stay Team
